text: Eden Hason (, born August 25 1994) is an Israeli singer-songwriter and record producer. ==Early life== Hason was born in Pardes Hanna-Karkur to a religious family. His father Yoram, a truck driver and his mother Esther, a kindergarten teacher. During his military service, he served at the Air Force Base in Mitzpe Ramon, where he was part of an emergency squad. ==Career== Hason released his first song Shemishehu Yaatzor Oti. The song has been very successful and is ranked fourth in the Galgalatz 2018 Song of the Year. Hason also won the piece with the ACUM's "Song of the Year" award in 2019. On April 4 2019, his debut album was released. ==Discography== *Shemishehu Yaatzor Oti (2019) ==References== ==External links== * Facebook * YouTube Category:Israeli male singers Category:1994 births Category:Living people Category:People from Pardes Hanna-Karkur Category:Israeli Jews Category:Israeli record producers
title: Eden Hason
